Title: Chapter 7
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Kate Barnow, Beau Willimon, Sam Forman (staff writer), Kate Barnow (story editor)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Kate Mara, Michael Kelly
Plot: Frank helps Peter get ready for his governor race, but Peter is starting to have second thoughts. Doug tries to help a young hooker in trouble.
